page.title: 05WESTERGATE SCHOOL
page.content: Here are some questions we have asked mr.N.Sorenson about his job and what he thinks of schools in 1985 for the BBC Domesday Project. The first question we asked him was 1) What do you work as ? {A Community Tutor. 2) What exactly do you do ? I allow people to come and use the school while it is not in use by the pupils and teachers. 3) Do you enjoy working as a Community Tutor ? Yes, it is different from teaching in the classroom. 4)How has{Westergate School}changed in the past few years that you have been working here? The look of the school is more modern especially as you walk in and we have built a shop .
